title: Evidence-Based STEM Instructional Design: Enhancing Problem-Solving and Inquiry Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical and scientific concept comprehension, general problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: A non-degree program for working professionals, emphasizing the application of STEM thinking in social science fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core STEM concepts (energy, systems, data analysis) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can deconstruct complex problems and design step-by-step solutions using evidence-based instructional strategies
Learners can perform iterative problem-solving processes through peer assessment and feedback using LMS-based collaboration tools
Learners can monitor and adjust their learning processes by applying metacognitive strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
